title: Mlioglotl
data:

| Attack2                                                                         | 25 ([trample](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [trample](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                                                      |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                         | [rF+](/Fire "Fire") [rC+](/Cold "Cold") [rElec](/Electricity "Electricity") [rPois+++](/Poison "Poison") [rMiasma](/Miasma "Miasma") [rN+++](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") [rTorm](/Torment "Torment") |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A demon prince once possessed a hunger for power that was exceptional even by the standards of his kind. He betrayed his realm to Lugonu, and his reward was to become this twisted mass of corruption, now known only as Mlioglotl. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Mlioglotl, the Unformed Horror** is a [thrashing horror](/Thrashing_horror "Thrashing horror") of [Lugonu](/Lugonu "Lugonu") that can corrupt the floor around him, summoning monsters from [the Abyss](/The_Abyss "The Abyss").

Mlioglotl can appear in the following locations:

- [The Swamp](/The_Swamp "The Swamp")
- [The Shoals](/The_Shoals "The Shoals")
- [The Snake Pit](/The_Snake_Pit "The Snake Pit")
- [The Spider's Nest](/The_Spider%27s_Nest "The Spider's Nest")

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                        |                                                      |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Might](/Might "Might")                | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Cause Fear](/Cause_Fear "Cause Fear") | [Priest flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")  |
| Slot3       | [Corrupt](/Corrupt "Corrupt")          | [Priest flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")  |

## Tips & Tricks

- Mlioglotl is a *very* high-tier threat for the places he spawns in, similar to [Mara](/Mara "Mara"). Alone, he is naturally fast, hits hard (especially when [mighted](/Might "Might")), is resistant to many elements, and is quite durable. But he can summon creatures from the Abyss, which can be far [out-of-depth](/Out-of-depth "Out-of-depth"). If he summons too many creatures, consider [teleporting](/Teleport "Teleport") away (or any other method of escape).
  - Remember you don't have to kill everything in *Crawl*! Skipping the floor he's on is perfectly reasonable.
- Unlike most demonic abilities, Mlioglotl's Corrupt *is* stopped by [silence](/Silence "Silence") and [waterlog](/Waterlog "Waterlog"), since it's considered "[priestly](/Lugonu "Lugonu")". With high Evocations skill, a [phial of floods](/Phial_of_floods "Phial of floods") can give you enough time to kill him before any summons appear. Strong melee/ranged fighters can buff up, use a [scroll of silence](/Scroll_of_silence "Scroll of silence"), and fight. He can still Might when silenced, however.
- Mlioglotl is weak to [silver](/Silver "Silver") and [holy wrath](/Holy_wrath "Holy wrath").
- Mlioglotl has good [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower"), but a [scroll of vulnerability](/Scroll_of_vulnerability "Scroll of vulnerability") will make it reasonable for a [wand of paralysis](/Wand_of_paralysis "Wand of paralysis") or [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes") spells to work. However, use this with *extreme* caution, since Corrupt can create [great orbs of eyes](/Great_orbs_of_eyes "Great orbs of eyes"), [dread liches](/Dread_lich "Dread lich"), and other will-checking threats. It's heavily recommended to have a way to silence/waterlog him when using vulnerability.
- Followers of [Yredelemnul](/Yredelemnul "Yredelemnul") can convert him into a powerful bound soul. Mlioglotl's abyssal summons include [liches](/Lich "Lich") and [starcursed masses](/Starcursed_mass "Starcursed mass"), which makes him strong enough for the late game.

## History

- Prior to [0.29](/0.29 "0.29"), Mlioglotl was considered [nonliving](/Nonliving "Nonliving"), and both Cause Fear and Corrupt were considered "[Magical](/Spell_slot_flag "Spell slot flag")" instead of Priestly.
- Mlioglotl was added in [0.28](/0.28 "0.28").
html:
Mlioglotl

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Mlioglotl X 
HP 92-187
HD 15
XP 1797
Speed 14
AC 10
EV 5
Will 120
Attack1 20 (hit: plain)
Attack2 25 (trample: trample)


Resistances rF+
rC+
rElec
rPois+++
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Silver
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Demonic
Size Giant
Type thrashing horror, Mlioglotl
Flags Speaks
Unique
Male
A demon prince once possessed a hunger for power that was exceptional even by the standards of his kind. He betrayed his realm to Lugonu, and his reward was to become this twisted mass of corruption, now known only as Mlioglotl.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Mlioglotl, the Unformed Horror is a thrashing horror of Lugonu that can corrupt the floor around him, summoning monsters from the Abyss.

Mlioglotl can appear in the following locations:

  • The Swamp
  • The Shoals
  • The Snake Pit
  • The Spider's Nest

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Might Natural flag
Slot2 Cause Fear Priest flag
Slot3 Corrupt Priest flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Mlioglotl is a very high-tier threat for the places he spawns in, similar to Mara. Alone, he is naturally fast, hits hard (especially when mighted), is resistant to many elements, and is quite durable. But he can summon creatures from the Abyss, which can be far out-of-depth. If he summons too many creatures, consider teleporting away (or any other method of escape).
    • Remember you don't have to kill everything in Crawl! Skipping the floor he's on is perfectly reasonable.
  • Unlike most demonic abilities, Mlioglotl's Corrupt is stopped by silence and waterlog, since it's considered "priestly". With high Evocations skill, a phial of floods can give you enough time to kill him before any summons appear. Strong melee/ranged fighters can buff up, use a scroll of silence, and fight. He can still Might when silenced, however.
  • Mlioglotl is weak to silver and holy wrath.
  • Mlioglotl has good willpower, but a scroll of vulnerability will make it reasonable for a wand of paralysis or Hexes spells to work. However, use this with extreme caution, since Corrupt can create great orbs of eyes, dread liches, and other will-checking threats. It's heavily recommended to have a way to silence/waterlog him when using vulnerability.
  • Followers of Yredelemnul can convert him into a powerful bound soul. Mlioglotl's abyssal summons include liches and starcursed masses, which makes him strong enough for the late game.

History

  • Prior to 0.29, Mlioglotl was considered nonliving, and both Cause Fear and Corrupt were considered "Magical" instead of Priestly.
  • Mlioglotl was added in 0.28.

rawPage:
{{version030}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Mlioglotl, the Unformed Horror''' is a [[thrashing horror]] of [[Lugonu]] that can corrupt the floor around him, summoning monsters from [[the Abyss]].

Mlioglotl can appear in the following locations:
* [[The Swamp]]
* [[The Shoals]]
* [[The Snake Pit]]
* [[The Spider's Nest]]

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Mlioglotl is a ''very'' high-tier threat for the places he spawns in, similar to [[Mara]]. Alone, he is naturally fast, hits hard (especially when [[might]]ed), is resistant to many elements, and is quite durable. But he can summon creatures from the Abyss, which can be far [[out-of-depth]]. If he summons too many creatures, consider [[teleport]]ing away (or any other method of escape).
**Remember you don't have to kill everything in ''Crawl''! Skipping the floor he's on is perfectly reasonable.
*Unlike most demonic abilities, Mlioglotl's Corrupt ''is'' stopped by [[silence]] and [[waterlog]], since it's considered "[[Lugonu|priestly]]". With high Evocations skill, a [[phial of floods]] can give you enough time to kill him before any summons appear. Strong melee/ranged fighters can buff up, use a [[scroll of silence]], and fight. He can still Might when silenced, however.
*Mlioglotl is weak to [[silver]] and [[holy wrath]].
*Mlioglotl has good [[willpower]], but a [[scroll of vulnerability]] will make it reasonable for a [[wand of paralysis]] or [[Hexes]] spells to work. However, use this with ''extreme'' caution, since Corrupt can create [[great orbs of eyes]], [[dread lich]]es, and other will-checking threats. It's heavily recommended to have a way to silence/waterlog him when using vulnerability.
*Followers of [[Yredelemnul]] can convert him into a powerful bound soul. Mlioglotl's abyssal summons include [[lich]]es and [[starcursed mass]]es, which makes him strong enough for the late game.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.29]], Mlioglotl was considered [[nonliving]], and both Cause Fear and Corrupt were considered "[[spell slot flag|Magical]]" instead of Priestly.
*Mlioglotl was added in [[0.28]].
